description.value:
Frequency once per day

Trigger An adjacent creature you can see fails an attack roll against you.

You dart away from your foe's attack with a casual laugh, using the opening to cause mischief. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Steal] an item from the triggering creature, ignoring the usual restriction that the creature can't be in combat.
